articles.author: Andrea Adelson
articles.title: LSU ousts Iowa, as Mulkey secures her fourth NCAA title - ESPN
articles.description: Angel Reese and the LSU Tigers, underdogs headed into the season finale against Caitlyn Clark and the Iowa Hawkeyes, cruised to an emotional national-title victory on Sunday, posting a 102-85 decision at American Airlines Center in Dallas.
articles.content: DALLAS -- When Kim Mulkey stunned the women's college basketball world to take the LSU job, there never really seemed to be a question that at some point, she would lead the Tigers to a national cham… [+4465 chars]

articles.author: Sam Tonkin
articles.title: NASA will unveil its first moon crew in 50 years tomorrow - Daily Mail
articles.description: Three Americans and a Canadian will be revealed to the world on Monday (April 3) as they gear up to fly around our lunar satellite as part of the Artemis II mission scheduled for 2024.

articles.title: Communities face major destruction after large tornadoes tear through the South and Midwest, leaving at least 24 dead - CNN
